Title: Afterglow
Actors: Nick Nolte, Julie Christie, Lara Flynn Boyle, Jonny Lee Miller
Plot: Two families are unhappy with their respective relationships: first of ambitious businessman Jeffrey Byron and sexually frustrated Marianne and second of repair contractor Lucky Mann and former B-movie actress Phyllis. When Lucky arrives to Byron's apartment to make some minor repair and Marianne becomes obsessed with him, the everyday balance breaks.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 3 nominations.
